thread.title: Zooey Deschanel reveals her baby girl's name, brought to you in part by the animal kingdom
thread.title_full: Zooey Deschanel reveals her baby girl's name, brought to you in part by the animal kingdom

author: Christie D&apos;Zurilla
title: Zooey Deschanel reveals her baby girl's name, brought to you in part by the animal kingdom
text:
Zooey Deschanel reveals her baby girl's name, brought to you in part by the animal kingdom Zooey Deschanel 
Zooey Deschanel at the "Rock the Kasbah" premiere Monday in New York City. 
Zooey Deschanel at the "Rock the Kasbah" premiere Monday in New York City. (Theo Wargo / Getty Images) 
Zooey Deschanel and husband Jacob Pechenik have shared their baby girl's name, and it's pretty high on the celebrity quirk scale, but in a really cute way. 
The winning moniker: Elsie Otter. 
"Like the animal," the "New Girl" star told People at the "Rock the Kasbah" premiere Monday night in New York. Pechenik, who tied the knot with his lady around the time Elsie was born, helped paint a more specific picture: "Sea otter!" 
SIGN UP for the free Essential Arts & Culture newsletter >> 
Of course it's Elsie Otter. Because it's Zooey Deschanel, and we wouldn't expect anything less. 
The 35-year-old new mom -- her daughter was born in Austin, Texas, in late July -- continued the riff on the "Today" show Tuesday after the exuberant panel of co-hosts couldn't get her to spill many details on what it was like to film "Kasbah" with Bill Murray.
